QE Music Examples

Section 1

Short-term structure

  • Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star (original)
  • Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star (variation 1: pitch difference is too small)
  • Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star (variation 2: pitch difference is too large)
  • Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star (variation 3: pitch difference is random)

Long-term structure

  • Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star (variation 4: no long-term structure)
  • Fractal music that sounds random

Creativity - Original Patterns

  • Beethoven’s Moonlight Sonata
  • Debussy’s Clair de Lune
  • Twinkle Twinkle Little Star

Creativity - Sophisticated / Complex Patterns

  • Chopin’s Fantasie-Impromptu
  • Chopin’s Etude op. 10 no. 4
  • Rimsky-Korsakov’s Flight of the Bumblebee
  • Liszt’s Etude no. 3 Un Sospiro

Composition styles of various Chopin Marzukas

  • Chopin’s Marzuka Op. 7 no. 4
  • Chopin’s Marzuka Op. 24 no. 4
  • Chopin’s Marzuka Op. 7 no. 1
  • Chopin’s Marzuka Op. 7 no. 2
  • Chopin’s Marzuka Op. 7 no. 3
